title: Quest item rewards

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page is a list of the possible item rewards obtained upon completing quests.

content:
This article or section is incomplete and could do with improvement.
You can discuss this issue on the talk page or edit this article to improve it.
This article is about item rewards. For experience rewards, see Quest experience rewards.

This page is a list of the possible item rewards obtained upon completing quests.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
  • 2 Armour
  • 3 Miscellaneous items
  • 4 Cosmetics

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Weapon rewards from quests
Quest Reward
A Tail of Two Cats Mouse toy
A Taste of Hope Ivandis flail
Animal Magnetism Blessed axe
Another Slice of H.A.M. Ancient mace
Between a Rock... Rune pickaxe
Contact! Keris
Demon Slayer Silverlight
Desert Treasure Ancient staff
Fairytale I - Growing Pains Magic secateurs
In Aid of the Myreque Gadderhammer and Rod of ivandis
Lost City Dramen staff
Lunar Diplomacy Lunar staff
Merlin's Crystal Excalibur
Nature Spirit Silver sickle (b)
Priest in Peril Wolfbane
Ratcatchers Rat pole
Roving Elves Crystal bow
Shadow of the Storm Darklight
Sins of the Father Blisterwood flail
Tai Bwo Wannai Trio Rune spear(kp)
The Enchanted Key Saradomin mjolnir, Zamorak mjolnir and Guthix mjolnir
The General's Shadow Shadow sword
The Great Brain Robbery Barrelchest anchor[1]
The Knight's Sword Blurite sword
Mage Arena I Saradomin staff, Zamorak staff or Guthix staff[2]
Underground Pass Iban's staff
  1. ^ The barrelchest anchor must be repaired by Smith before it can be used as a weapon.
  2. ^ The staff you will get depends on which God cape you chose after the quest.

Armour[edit | edit source]

Armour rewards from quests
Quest Reward
Animal Magnetism Ava's attractor or Ava's accumulator[1]
A Kingdom Divided Book of the dead
Between a Rock... Gold helmet
Client of Kourend Kharedst's memoirs
Dragon Slayer I Anti-dragon shield
Elemental Workshop I Elemental shield
Elemental Workshop II Mind helmet
Family Crest Steel gauntlets[2]
Fight Arena Khazard armour set
Grim Tales Dwarven helmet
Hazeel Cult Carnillean armour or Hazeel's mark[3]
Haunted Mine Salve amulet
Horror from the Deep God books
Imp Catcher Amulet of accuracy
Lair of Tarn Razorlor Salve amulet (e)
Legends' Quest Cape of legends
Lunar Diplomacy Lunar equipment
Mountain Daughter Bearhead
Rag and Bone Man II Bonesack and Ram skull helm
Recipe for Disaster Culinaromancer's gloves
Recruitment Drive Initiate sallet
Roving Elves Crystal shield
Shilo Village Beads of the dead
The Fremennik Isles Helm of neitiznot
Mage Arena I Saradomin cape, Zamorak cape or Guthix cape
Mage Arena II Imbued saradomin cape, Imbued zamorak cape or Imbued guthix cape
Tree Gnome Village Gnome amulet
Underground Pass Klank's gauntlets
What Lies Below Beacon ring
  1. ^ Ava's attractor is the standard reward, however ava's accumulator is rewarded if the player has at least level 50 Ranged.
  2. ^ These gauntlets can be turned into Cooking gauntlets, Goldsmith gauntlets or Chaos gauntlets.
  3. ^ The Cernillean armour is only available during the quest so you will need to obtain an extra one if you want to keep it for yourself.

A Taste of Hope Drakan's medallion
Bear Your Soul Soul bearer

The Depths of Despair Lunch by the lancalliums

Dragon Slayer II Locator orb
Enakhra's Lament Camulet
Enter the Abyss Small pouch
The Forsaken Tower Jewellery of jubilation
Garden of Tranquillity Ring of charos (a)
Ghosts Ahoy Ectophial and Bedsheet
Icthlarin's Little Helper Catspeak amulet
Lunar Diplomacy Seal of passage
Making History Enchanted key
Monkey Madness I M'speak amulet and 10th squad sigil
Monkey Madness II Royal seed pod
Mourning's End Part I Fixed device
Mourning's End Part II Crystal trinket
One Small Favour Steel key ring
Shadow of the Storm Demonic sigil
The Ascent of Arceuus A dark disposition
The Great Brain Robbery Prayer book
The Queen of Thieves The fisher's flute
The Restless Ghost Ghostspeak amulet
Rum Deal Holy wrench
Shilo Village Bone key
A Tail of Two Cats Catspeak amulet (e)
Tale of the Righteous History and hearsay
Temple of Ikov Shiny key, Pendant of lucien and Armadyl pendant[1]
The Eyes of Glouphire Crystal saw seed
The Tourist Trap Wrought iron key
Troll Romance Sled
Waterfall Quest Glarial's amulet

Cosmetics[edit | edit source]

Cosmetic rewards from quests
Quest Reward
A Tail of Two Cats Doctor's hat or Nurse hat
Biohazard Medical gown
Curse of the Empty Lord Ghostly robes
Eagles' Peak Fake beak and Eagle cape
Enakhra's Lament Camel mask
Enlightened Journey Bomber jacket costume
Monkey Madness II Monkey
Mourning's End Part I Mourner gear
Murder Mystery Silver necklace[2]
Plague City Gas mask
Sheep Herder Plague suit
Spirits of the Elid Robe of elidinis (top) and Robe of elidinis (bottom)
The Fremennik Isles Silly jester costume
The Tourist Trap Slave robes
Tower of Life Builder's costume
  1. ^ If you sided with Lucien during the quest, you must kill Guardians of Armadyl to obtain the Armadyl Pendant.
  2. ^ Only if you drop it and pick it up after completing the quest.
